ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 122
ygData.msgSnippet: ... That s a very passive attitude.  I believe that if you tell someone to take a look at themselves, and their posts from another perspective.  Think before
ygData.messageBody:
>
> From: "Goode, Jason" <JGoode@...>
>
> >
> > But The game is just a game. Monks have been tuned (nerfed), life
> > and game go on.
> >
>
> Fine, you've moved beyond it. Others haven't. No reason to extend this
> thread further by calling them whiners and telling the to suck it up and
> live with it. It's just plain inflamatory and extends the thread even
> further. It you really are tire of hearing it and want the thread to die
> off, then stop responding and let it die off. Unless you are the list
> admin, there's no other way you can end the thread.
>

That's a very passive attitude. I believe that if you tell someone
to take a look at themselves, and their posts from another
perspective. Think before they post, about half the idiot posts would
not be sent.

If no one responds and complains about one bad email. The offender will
just send another, and another, and another. Eventually someone
(me) needs to tell that person that his e-mails aren't being productive
and he is only hurting his own name, that person will stop or the
emails will be a lot more well thought out.
